entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this morning then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
